page.title: 02SUPERNATURAL/JOBS
page.content: {SUPERNATURAL A man hanged himself in Danehill Church boiler room. On the A265 a ghost in a grey cloak walks down the road and then disappears behind a bush. It is also said that if the field behind the Crocadile pub in Danehill is mown it starts to rain. {JOBS { }Most people commute, but many work at Freshfields Brickworks, Woodgate Dairy, Gatwick Airport, in Schools, Shops and on farms. Unemployment is below the national average,but farmers still have to sack employees because they can not afford them.
